  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int _userInput) throws FileNotFoundException
      Parameters:
      _userInput - :: Takes User Input as an integer and sets the total number of players. Then we use the total number of players to create players.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - :: For the JSON Files when instantiating the Deck object.

  • Method Details

    • isGameRunning

      public boolean isGameRunning()
      A function that tracks if the game is still running or not.
      Returns:
      if the game is running or not

    • distributeThreeCards

      public void distributeThreeCards()
      Distributes three cards at the beginning of the game.

    • printCommands

      public void printCommands()
      Prints the possible commands on the terminal upon a certain 'Key' click

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      Draws a card from the deck stack. If the deck is empty we first add all the cards in the pile, then we shuffles them, and finally we add them to the deck stack.
      Returns:
      card :: A popped card from the top of the stack, and added to the hand of the player

    • throwCard

      public void throwCard(Card _card)
      Parameters:
      _card - :: Throws a card to the pile (Adds it to the stack of piles)

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Card _card)
      A logic that handles placing Rule cards and Goal cards. If the card is a Goal card, we keep it as an instance in order to get the Wincondition1 (String) and Wincondition2 (String) to win the game, and to print them in the terminal upon Key press.
      Parameters:
      _card - :: What the player throws

    • run

      public void run(Scanner scan) throws InterruptedException
      Game loop of the game where everything is handled. We used reggex to extract a number from a string since we are taking Letters (for commands), and (Numbers) to select cards. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/18590901/check-and-extract-a-number-from-a-string-in-java
      Parameters:
      scan - :: Scanner that takes the player input
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • draw

      public void draw()
      The current player draws as many cards as the draw limit

    • play

      public void play(Scanner scan) throws InterruptedException
      Takes the input of the index of the card during the play limit loop and depending on the card follows the game rules till the two keepers are held by someone.
      Parameters:
      scan -
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • gameWinningCondition

      public boolean gameWinningCondition()
      Game winning method. It loops through the player's Keepers, and checks if condition 1 and condition 2 are met.
      Returns:
      boolean (if the player has both keepers or no)

    • showRules

      public void showRules()
      A function the prints the rules of the game. - Play Limit - Hand Limit - Keeper Limit - Draw Limit

    • showGoal

      public void showGoal()
      A function that prints the current goal in play, and what are the two conditions to be met (Keepers needed for winning).

    • showHelp

      public void showHelp()
      A function that prints the rules of the game and how the game is setup (Took this from the manual).
